item.title: Hyde主题使用教程
item.description: Hyde is a brazen two-column hugo theme based on the Jekyll theme of the same name. It pairs a prominent sidebar with uncomplicated content. Contents Contents Installation Quick Start Standard Installation Options Sidebar menu Sidebar description Sticky sidebar content Themes Reverse layout Disqus Google Analytics Author Ported By License Installation Quick Start To give you a running start this installation puts a fully configured starter repo into your Git account and sets it up in a content manager / CMS.
